plot: A woman comes to suspect that her father may have been lying about the death of her mother when her stepmother turns up murdered.
title: Angae doshi
plot_es: A woman comes to suspect that her father may have been lying about the death of her mother when her stepmother turns up murdered.
plot_en: A woman comes to suspect that her father may have been lying about the death of her mother when her stepmother turns up murdered.
